title: ‘AI is a business strategy… if you don’t know where you’re going, the cleverest tool in the world won’t get you there’
description: When eBay needed a keynote speaker to help thousands of UK sellers understand the strategic potential of artificial intelligence, they turned to Suzanne Hill - a Holywood-based business strategist whose career has been devoted to helping small and medium-sized companies grow, scale and compete internationally.
content:
At eBay Open 2025, held at Birmingham’s NEC, Suzanne stood on a circular stage in front of more than 4,000 sellers and hundreds of eBay staff. Her message was simple but provocative: AI isn’t an IT project. It’s a business strategy.
“Every conversati... [4935 chars]

title: AI promises to shape a future for billions
description: THE relentless march of artificial intelligence (AI) continues, raising both immense hopes and daunting anxieties. Amid the hype and uncertainty, a beacon of clarity emerged at the Heidelberg Laureate Forum, courtesy of two giants in the field: Jeff Dean and David Patterson. Their presentation, “Shaping AI’s Impact to Help Billions,” wasn’t just another technical overview; it was a call to action, a blueprint for steering AI toward a future where its benefits are broadly shared and its potential harms are proactively mitigated.

title: Adobe struggles to assure investors that it can thrive in AI era
